Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3164 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3164 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtiff is earlier than 4.6.0-5, affected by CVE-2023-3164
